ygData.subject: Re: End of Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Naeeldar  To:  Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 9:29 AM Subject: Re: [eqbards] End of Kiting? ... this ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 9:29 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] End of Kiting?


> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Hmm either I misunderstood your post or you misunderstood brad's. When
this
> is implemented and you pull with a dot spell it will no longer do damage
> because it will be chasing after you.
>
> Naemin Level 7 Wood Elf Bard
> Naeeldar Level 35 Dark Elf Necromancer
>

Then you stop, and it starts taking damage again. The increased duration
makes up for the lost ticks of damage during the pull.

The dot doesn't end when (monster attacking && has velocity) it just
doesn't do any damage if that's true on the tick.
